RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 22200. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000, if for $7,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $6,250 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: J M R GEMMA stalked the early leader, was roused on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch drew off. JARA was in range, raced evenly on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was second best. HASN'T HIT ME YET was unhurried early, hustled along on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch was up for show. DETERMINED LOVE set the pace and took command on the turn but was headed in mid stretch and was empty. FRESH DREAMS was in touch but trailed the field on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch had no late klick.

ENTRY.NAME: J M R Gemma
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, roused turn, 3-path stretch, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Fresh Dreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, trailed turn, 3-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Jara
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, evenly turn, 4-path stretch, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Hasn't Hit Me Yet
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, hustled along turn, 5-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Determined Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, took command turn, headed mid stretch, empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAFA FOOEY was up close, had a slim lead on the turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch prevailed. BRADY O'BRADY was off the pace, saved ground on the turn and from the five path at the top of the stretch just missed. W W SPRINGTIME was away alertly and forced the pace on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was outfinished. BE THE CHANGE was unhurried early and roused on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch needed more. ARTIE MY BOY was hustled early and a factor on the turn but weakened through the stretch. BEASTFROMTHEEAST was off slow, taken up on the turn and had no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Artie My Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, factor turn, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Beastfromtheeast
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, taken up turn, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Fafa Fooey
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, slim lead turn, 3-path stretch, prevailed

ENTRY.NAME: Be the Change
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, roused turn, 6-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: W W Springtime
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, forced pace turn, 4-path stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Brady O'Brady
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, saved ground turn, 5-path stretch, just missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 3 1M 70Y Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 19800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $6,250, if for $6,000, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $5, 000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TIMMINS was unhurried early, gained ground on the far turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was kept to task. SANTIAGO SALSA was off the pace and had a mild gain on the far turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch was no match for the winner. GOLDEN CHELLA set the pace and had the lead on the far turn but was headed at the top of the stretch and held show. IRIE ISLAND MAN stalked the early leader and had a good position on the far turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch leveled off. LUNATICA was in range but chased on the far turn and was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Lunatica
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, chased far turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Chella
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, led far turn, headed top stretch, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Irie Island Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked, good position far turn, 5-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Timmins
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, gained ground far turn, 4-path stretch, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: Santiago Salsa
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, mild gain far turn, 6-path stretch, no match

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 4 5F Turf CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 15100. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000, if for $3,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this race will be run at a distance of Five Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS D'S PRIDE was away alertly, a factor on the turn and switched to the inside and was up in time. CHICAGO FREDDY was hustled early, had a clear lead on the turn and was second best in a good effort. LEMONSANDDIAMONDS was off the pace, raced evenly on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch was up for show. EL BANDOLERO showed no speed and saved ground on the turn but was no real threat. MY SONG BABY was in touch and hustled along on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch leveled off. MY WROTE was well back, showed little and from the six path at the top of the stretch had no impact. FIRST ROUND was off slow, chased on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch faded.

ENTRY.NAME: Chicago Freddy
ENTRY.OWNER: Princeton Farms Inc Ham Nelson and Bechtal Glenn
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, clear lead turn, 2nd best, good effort

ENTRY.NAME: First Round
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, chased turn, 4-path stretch, faded

ENTRY.NAME: El Bandolero
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground turn, no real threat

ENTRY.NAME: Lemonsanddiamonds
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, evenly turn, 4-path stretch, up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Miss D's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, factor turn, switched inside, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: My Wrote
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, showed little, 6-path stretch, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: My Song Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, hustled along turn, 5-path stretch, leveled off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 64. Claiming Purse 15750. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000, if for $4,750, allowed 2 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Eligibility) (*Plus Up To $540 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: REMEMBEROLDTYMES showed speed from the inside and set the pace, had a clear lead on the turn and was much the best. ORBITING THE SKY was well back, trailed the field on the turn and angled outside at the top of the stretch and rallied late. LOUEMMA was in touch and moved up on the turn but from the the five path at the top of the stretch evened out. WEST PAW was hustled early and a factor on the turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch leveled off. KOZY KAT stalked the leader but chased on the turn and from the four path at the top of the stretch had no rally. J M R BOLD VISION was in range and saved ground on the turn but was not a factor.

ENTRY.NAME: West Paw
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled early, factor turn, 3-path stretch, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Rememberoldtymes
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed inside, set pace, clear lead turn, much the best

ENTRY.NAME: J M R Bold Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, saved ground turn, not a factor

ENTRY.NAME: Orbiting the Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, trailed turn, angled out stretch, rallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Kozy Kat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, chased turn, 4-path stretch, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Louemma
ENTRY.OWNER: Ascot Stud Willwerth James and Stocker-Parks Rachel
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, moved up turn, 5-path stretch, evened out

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 6 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Allowance Purse 24600. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. (Colts And Geldings Preferred)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Br eeders Awards).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VICTORY MARCH was unhurried early, had a mild gain on the turn and from the seven path at the top of the stretch rallied in time. RAGING BEAR set the pace and had a clear lead on the turn but from the three path through the stretch was caught late. ACTION POINT was in touch and hustled along on the turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch needed more. ERNIE'S MARTINI stalked the early leader and was roused from between foes on the turn but from the five path at the top of the stretch had no response. WORKIN OUT settled off the early leaders and raced evenly on the turn but from the six path at the top of the stretch failed to fire.

ENTRY.NAME: Action Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, hustled along turn, 4-path stretch, needed more

ENTRY.NAME: Raging Bear
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, clear lead turn, 3-path stretch, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Ernie's Martini
ENTRY.OWNER: Chesney, Stephen and Hoffman, Cory S.
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked leader, roused between turn, 5-path stretch, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Victory March
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, mild gain turn, 7-path stretch, rallied in time

ENTRY.NAME: Workin Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off leaders, evenly turn, 6-path stretch, failed to fire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: FORT ERIE RACE 7 7F Turf CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 21600. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 122 lbs. (Limited To 10 Starters)(*Plus Up To $4,725 Ontario Bred/Ontario Sired Breeders Awards). If deemed inadvisable by management to run on the turf, this ra ce will be run at a distance of Six and One Half Furlongs on the main track.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLIDAY WITH AMY was in range, a factor on the far turn and from the three path at the top of the stretch fought gamely for the win. ASHWICKEN was unhurried early and gained ground on the far turn but from the four path at the top of the stretch was outgunned. PERFECTION SAVER showed no speed, saved ground on the far turn and finished well. MIZZ GEMMA was in touch and raced evenly on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch had no late kick. EYE GOT IT GOOD set a pressured pace and dueled on the far turn but had nothing left. SOPRISE ASTRAY was up close and had a slim lead on the far turn but from the three path at the top of the stretch faded. SUPER FOLLOW was well back, closed the gap on the far turn and passed tired foes through the stretch. LOADED MISTRESS was off the pace and showed little in a dull effort. NAVY BLUE ANGEL forced the pace but lost ground on the far turn and was empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Super Follow
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back, closed gap far turn, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday With Amy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in range, factor far turn, 3-path stretch, fought gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Eye Got It Good
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, dueled far turn, nothing left

ENTRY.NAME: Navy Blue Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: forced pace, lost ground far turn, empty

ENTRY.NAME: Perfection Saver
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed, saved ground far turn, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Mizz Gemma
ENTRY.COMMENT: in touch, evenly far turn, 3-path stretch, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Ashwicken
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried, gained ground far turn, 4-path stretch, outgunned

ENTRY.NAME: Soprise Astray
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close, slim lead far turn, 3-path stretch, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Loaded Mistress
ENTRY.OWNER: Manohar Chris K and Bharat Randy
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, showed little, dull effort
